Can be used to talk about the actual flower, flowers in general, or the color purple. Can also be used in reference to springtime. May be used as part of the symbolic table setting for Nowruz, the Persian New Year.

title: Ginger
description:
A segment of ginger root with light brown skin and a yellowish core.

Can be used to talk about ginger root or roots in general. Can also be used to talk about spice, flavor, cooking, or baking. May also be also be used to talk redheads.

title: Pea Pod
description:
A green pea pod split to reveal a row of peas inside.

Can be used to talk about actual pea pods or peas, pods or vegetables in general, or the color green. May be used along with the phrase two peas in a pod.

title: Khanda
description: The Khanda, the symbol of the Sikhism.

title: Wireless
description: The symbol for a wireless or Wi-Fi connection enclosed in a square.

title: Black Bird
description:
A bird with black feathers, shown either standing in full profile or as a bird head. Can be used to represent various black-feathered birds, such as crows, ravens, blackbirds, and more.

Black-feathered birds have been associated with magic and the occult across many global cultures, often as an omen of bad tidings.

title: Lime
description: The sour, green-colored citrus fruit of the lime, usually shown as a single sliced wedge.

title: Head Shaking Vertically
description:
A yellow smiley face with closed eyes and a mouth with a subtle upward curl, shown with motion lines indicating that the smiley is shaking its head up and down vertically. 

This is intended to depict a nodding gesture, which is commonly (but not universally) used to indicate agreement, acceptance, or acknowledgment.

title: Head Shaking Horizontally
description:
A yellow smiley face with closed eyes and a mouth with a subtle upward curl, shown with motion lines indicating that the smiley is shaking its head back and forth horizontally.

This is intended to depict a shaking head gesture, which is commonly (but not universally) used to indicate disagreement, denial, or rejection.

title: Broken Chain
description:
A single length of metal chain that has had one of its links forcefully broken apart. Usually displayed with emphasis marks around the fracture point.

Can be used to discuss freedom and liberty, as well as various types of malfunction.

title: Phoenix
description: A phoenix, a mythical immortal bird with flame-like feathers found in the folklore of many global cultures. Often used to symbolize renewal or rebirth.

title: Brown Mushroom
description: The edible fungus of the mushroom, depicted as a toadstool with a brown cap and stem.

title: Family: Adult, Child
description:
A family unit shown with one adult and one child. 

Usually depicted as a collection of silhouettes on a block color background, as per Unicode's recommendations.

title: Family: Adult, Adult, Child
description:
A family unit shown with two adults and one child. 

Usually depicted as a collection of silhouettes on a block color background, as per Unicode's recommendations.

title: Family: Adult, Child, Child
description:
A family unit shown with one adult and two children. 

Usually depicted as a collection of silhouettes on a block color background, as per Unicode's recommendations.

title: Family: Adult, Adult, Child, Child
description:
A family unit shown with two adults and two children. 

Usually depicted as a collection of silhouettes on a block color background, as per Unicode's recommendations.

title: Person Walking Facing Right
description: A person going for a walk, heading rightwards. Taking a slow-medium pace, this person would be a runner if they picked up their speed.

title: Man Walking Facing Right
description: A man going for a walk, heading rightwards. Taking a slow-medium pace, this person would be a runner if they picked up their speed.

title: Woman Walking Facing Right
description: A woman going for a walk, heading rightwards. Taking a slow-medium pace, this person would be a runner if they picked up their speed.

title: Person with White Cane Facing Right
description: A rightwards-facing person using a white cane as a mobility aid, presumably due to them being blind or visually impaired.

title: Man with White Cane Facing Right
description: A rightwards-facing man using a white cane as a mobility aid, presumably due to them being blind or visually impaired.

title: Woman with White Cane Facing Right
description: A rightwards-facing woman using a white cane as a mobility aid, presumably due to them being blind or visually impaired.

title: Person in Motorized Wheelchair Facing Right
description: A rightwards-facing person using a motorized wheelchair as a mobility aid.

title: Man in Motorized Wheelchair Facing Right
description: A rightwards-facing man using a motorized wheelchair as a mobility aid.

title: Woman in Motorized Wheelchair Facing Right
description: A rightwards-facing woman using a motorized wheelchair as a mobility aid.

title: Person in Manual Wheelchair Facing Right
description: A rightwards-facing person using a manual wheelchair as a mobility aid.

title: Man in Manual Wheelchair Facing Right
description: A rightwards-facing man using a manual wheelchair as a mobility aid.

title: Woman in Manual Wheelchair Facing Right
description: A rightwards-facing woman using a manual wheelchair as a mobility aid.

title: Person Running Facing Right
description: A person running rightwards, with a large stride and arms outstretched. May be wearing a running shirt.

title: Man Running Facing Right
description: A man running rightwards, with a large stride and arms outstretched. May be wearing a running shirt.

title: Woman Running Facing Right
description: A woman running rightwards, with a large stride and arms outstretched. May be wearing a running shirt.

title: Person Kneeling Facing Right
description: A person kneeling down on one or both knees, facing rightwards. May be used to represent someone in prayer, or a person resting on the floor.

title: Man Kneeling Facing Right
description: A man kneeling down on one or both knees, facing rightwards. May be used to represent someone in prayer, or a person resting on the floor.

title: Woman Kneeling Facing Right
description: A woman kneeling down on one or both knees, facing rightwards. May be used to represent someone in prayer, or a person resting on the floor.
